attributes.action: Speak to the Defence Committee regarding the shocking decision to axe 125 jobs in such a fragile island community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Western Isles has been dealt a devastating blow to its economy after the Ministry of Defence announced that 125 jobs are to be axed at the Hebrides missile range in South Uist.

It will mean one in six jobs in the southern isles economy is to be lost, after the MoD confirmed plans to halve the workforce at the base by controlling firing operations remotely from a rival base at Aberporth, south Wales.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to speak to the Defence Committee regarding the shocking decision to axe 125 jobs in such a fragile island community.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Hebrides
